code: import ApartmentInterior from'../assets/images/Apartment_interior_pexels-houzlook-3797991.jpg';import BedroomInterior from'../assets/images/Bedroom_interior_13395.-Download-Free-3D-Bedroom-Interior-Model-by-Nguyen-The-Dinh-1-scaled.jpg';import BosmalApartment from'../assets/images/Bosmal_Apartment_City_Center_Sarajevo.jpg';import CitySuite from'../assets/images/467427096.jpg';import InteriorVilla from'../assets/images/Interior_villa_pexels-fotoaibe-1571460.jpg';import ModernVilla from'../assets/images/Villa_1777_9215_1720971222.jpg';import DefaultImage from'../assets/images/No_Image_Available.jpg';export const PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL=[ApartmentInterior,BedroomInterior,InteriorVilla,ModernVilla,BosmalApartment,CitySuite];export const DEFAULT_PROPERTY_IMAGE=DefaultImage;export function getAccentImage(){let seed=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;if(!PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL.length)return DEFAULT_PROPERTY_IMAGE;const normalizedSeed=Math.abs(Number(seed)||0);return PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL[normalizedSeed%PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL.length];}export function buildFallbackGallery(){let desiredSize=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:4;let seed=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;if(!PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL.length)return[DEFAULT_PROPERTY_IMAGE];const gallery=[];for(let i=0;i<desiredSize;i+=1){gallery.push(PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL[(i+Math.abs(Number(seed)||0))%PROPERTY_IMAGE_POOL.length]);}return gallery;}
